name: Android CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    - name: Build Android App
      uses: amirisback/automated-build-android-app-with-github-action@2.2.4
      with:
        gradle-wrapper-path: './gradlew'  # Ensure this path is correct for your project structure
        build-command: 'assembleDebug'    # Specify the gradle task(s) you want to run, e.g., assembleDebug or assembleRelease
        working-directory: '.'            # Optional: specify if your gradle files are not in the repository root

    # Optional: add a step to upload artifacts if you want to keep the APK or other build outputs
    - uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
      with:
        name: android-build-artifacts
        path: app/build/outputs/**/*.apk   # Adjust path according to your build outputs
